original_text: Then Jesus went away from Tyre. He travelled through the city of Sidon. Then he went towards Lake Galilee. He was in the region called ‘The ten cities’.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 두로 지방에서 나와 시돈을 지나고 데가볼리 지방을 통과하여 갈릴리 호수에 이르시매

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus went away from Tyre.
He travelled through the city of Sidon.
Then he went towards Lake Galilee.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그분은 갈릴리 호수를 향해 가셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was in the region called 'The ten cities'.
